languages.text: The Cyber-Mastiff makes {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} melee attacks against random targets (including allies) adjacent to it, each dealing 50% of their normal damage

languages.text: The cyber-mastiff makes {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} single melee attacks against random adjacent targets (including allies), dealing −50% less damage.

languages.text: El cibermastín efectúa {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} ataques cuerpo a cuerpo contra objetivos adyacentes aleatorios (incluidos sus aliados), infligiendo un −50 % menos de daño.
languages.original_text: The cyber-mastiff makes {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} single melee attacks against random adjacent targets (including allies), dealing −50% less damage.

traits.locale_text: El cibermastín efectúa {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} ataques cuerpo a cuerpo contra objetivos adyacentes aleatorios (incluidos sus aliados), infligiendo un −50 % menos de daño.

languages.text: 生化獒犬对所有临近目标（包括盟友在内）随机进行{uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c}次近战攻击，每次攻击造成的伤害降低50%。
languages.original_text: The cyber-mastiff makes {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} single melee attacks against random adjacent targets (including allies), dealing −50% less damage.

traits.locale_text: 生化獒犬对所有临近目标（包括盟友在内）随机进行{uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c}次近战攻击，每次攻击造成的伤害降低50%。

languages.text: Le cyber-mastiff inflige {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} attaques de mêlée uniques à des cibles adjacentes aléatoires (y compris des alliés), mais inflige −50 % de dégâts.
languages.original_text: The cyber-mastiff makes {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} single melee attacks against random adjacent targets (including allies), dealing −50% less damage.

traits.locale_text: Le cyber-mastiff inflige {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} attaques de mêlée uniques à des cibles adjacentes aléatoires (y compris des alliés), mais inflige −50 % de dégâts.

languages.text: Siber mastif, bitişikteki rastgele hedeflere {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} tek yakın dövüş saldırısı gerçekleştirir ve %50 daha az hasar verir.
languages.original_text: The cyber-mastiff makes {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} single melee attacks against random adjacent targets (including allies), dealing −50% less damage.

traits.locale_text: Siber mastif, bitişikteki rastgele hedeflere {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} tek yakın dövüş saldırısı gerçekleştirir ve %50 daha az hasar verir.

languages.text: Кибермастиф совершает {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} одиночных атак против случайных целей (ими могут оказаться союзники) на соседних клетках, нанося урон, уменьшенный на 50%.
languages.original_text: The cyber-mastiff makes {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} single melee attacks against random adjacent targets (including allies), dealing −50% less damage.

traits.locale_text: Кибермастиф совершает {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} одиночных атак против случайных целей (ими могут оказаться союзники) на соседних клетках, нанося урон, уменьшенный на 50%.
Кибермастиф совершает {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} одиночных атак против случайных целей (ими могут оказаться союзники) на соседних клетках, нанося урон, уменьшенный на 50%.

languages.text: 隣接するランダムな対象（味方を含む）に対して{uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} 、与えるダメージが-50％減少する単体近接攻撃を行う。
languages.original_text: The cyber-mastiff makes {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} single melee attacks against random adjacent targets (including allies), dealing −50% less damage.

traits.locale_text: 隣接するランダムな対象（味方を含む）に対して{uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} 、与えるダメージが-50％減少する単体近接攻撃を行う。

languages.text: Der Cyber-Mastiff macht {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} Einzelangriffe im Nahkampf gegen zufällige Ziele auf benachbarten Feldern (Verbündete eingeschlossen) und verursacht dabei −50 % weniger Schaden.
languages.original_text: The cyber-mastiff makes {uip|Attack Number|a82be46a250047dcbaf7fe534441ae6c} single melee attacks against random adjacent targets (including allies), dealing −50% less damage.
